metadata.title: CVE-2019-18222 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The ECDSA signature implementation in ecdsa.c in Arm Mbed Crypto 2.1 andMbed TLS through 2.19.1 does not reduce the blinded scalar before computingthe inverse, which allows a local attacker to recover the private key viaside-channel attacks.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
